title: Nine Cabinet Ministers of all-party Govt. sworn in before President
body_lines: Nine new Cabinet Ministers of the all-party Government were sworn in before President Gotabaya Rajapaksa at the President’s House in Colombo yesterday morning.

They are; Nimal Siripala de Silva as Minister of Ports, Shipping and Aviation Services, Dr. Susil Premajayantha as Minister of Education, Dr. Keheliya Rambukwella as Minister of Health, Dr. Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe as Minister of Justice, Prison Affairs and Constitutional Reforms, Harin Fernando as Minister of Tourism and Lands, Dr. Ramesh Pathirana as Minister of Plantation Industries, Manusha Nanayakkara as Minister of Labour and Foreign Employment, Nalin Fernando as Minister of Trade, Commerce and Food Security and Tiran Alles as Minister of Public Security.
